name: John J. LYNCH, Petitioner v. The CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, The Philadelphia Prison System, Warden Blackmon, Respondents

parties: John J. LYNCH, Petitioner v. The CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, The Philadelphia Prison System, Warden Blackmon, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of September, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus and Request for Immediate Hearing are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
957 A.2d 1179
John J. LYNCH, Petitioner v. The CITY OF PHILADELPHIA, The Philadelphia Prison System, Warden Blackmon, Respondents.
No. 104 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 30, 2008.
